//Add 5 integers using variables and display their sum.
public class Sumwithvariables {


	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int num1 = 1;
		int num2 = 2;
		int num3 = 3;
		int num4 = 4;
		int num5 = 5;
		
		int sum = num1 + num2 + num3 + num4 + num5;
		
		System.out.println("Sum of five integers using variables: " + sum);
		

	}
}

Output:
Sum of five integers using variables: 15
